select
from FUN_SALE where SALE_PUBLISH = 1 and SALE_STATUS = 1 order by TRACK_TIME desc
mapper.update: #{sql}

select from FUN_SALE
${condition}

mapper.update: update FUN_SALE set TRACK_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone}, TRACK_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , TRACK_TIME) END, SPECIAL_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SPECIAL_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SPECIAL_TIME) END, SCHEDULE_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SCHEDULE_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SCHEDULE_TIME) END, SECRECY_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SECRECY_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , SECRECY_TIME) END, COMMEND_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , COMMEND_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , COMMEND_TIME) END, ACTION_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , ACTION_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , ACTION_TIME) END, PRIVATE_TIME = CASE WHEN DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , PRIVATE_TIME) > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE DATEADD(DD, #{pMap.timeZone} , PRIVATE_TIME) END where USER_ID = #{pMap.userId} and DEPT_ID = #{pMap.deptId} and COMP_ID = #{pMap.compId}
update FUN_SALE set AREA_ID = #{pMap.areaId}, REG_ID = #{pMap.regId} where COMP_ID = #{pMap.compId} and DEPT_ID= #{pMap.deptId}

SELECT TOP ${pageSize} CITY_ID,COMP_ID,BUILD_ID,SALE_USEAGE,TRADE_ADDR,ADDR_MD5,SALE_ID,SALE_ROOF,SALE_UNIT,UNIT_FLOOR,SALE_NUM FROM FUN_SALE WHERE ( (SALE_ROOF_T IS NULL AND SALE_ROOF IS NOT NULL) OR (SALE_UNIT_T IS NULL AND SALE_UNIT IS NOT NULL) OR (SALE_NUM_T IS NULL AND SALE_NUM IS NOT NULL) )
AND COMP_ID = #{compId}
mapper.update: UPDATE FUN_SALE SET ADDR_MD5 = #{addrMd5},LOCK=#{lock} WHERE SALE_ID=#{saleId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as totalCount,sum(iif(SALE_MAP>=3 and SALE_PUBLISH=1,1,0)) as canPublishCount FROM FUN_SALE WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND BUILD_ID=#{buildId}

SELECT TOP 10 A.CELL_PHONE, A.SALE_ID, A.CITY_ID, A.COMP_ID, A.AREA_ID, A.REG_ID, A.DEPT_ID, A.GR_ID, A.USER_ID, A.ARCHIVE_ID FROM FUN_SALE A LEFT JOIN FUN_PHONE B ON B.CASE_TYPE=1 AND B.CASE_ID=A.SALE_ID WHERE A.UPDATE_TIME >= '2017-05-26' AND LEN(A.CELL_PHONE) > 3 AND B.PHONE IS NULL
SELECT CELL_PHONE,JOINT_CELL_PHONE FROM FUN_SALE WHERE SALE_ID=#{saleId}
mapper.update: update FUN_SALE set ADS_FLAG = #{adsFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where SALE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime},1,0)) as xzHouseWeek, sum(1) as xzHouseMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and SALE_STATUS=4,1,0)) as ydHouseWeek, sum(iif(SALE_STATUS=4,1,0)) as ydHouseMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and SALE_STATUS=2,1,0)) as fpHouseWeek, sum(iif(SALE_STATUS=2,1,0)) as fpHouseMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and SALE_STATUS=5,1,0)) as ncjHouseWeek, sum(iif(SALE_STATUS=5,1,0)) as ncjHouseMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and SALE_STATUS=6,1,0)) as wcjHouseWeek, sum(iif(SALE_STATUS=6,1,0)) as wcjHouseMonth,
sum(iif(CREATION_TIME >= #{weekTime} and SALE_STATUS=7,1,0)) as zxhouseWeek, sum(iif(SALE_STATUS=7,1,0)) as zxhouseMonth
from FUN_SALE where CREATION_TIME >= #{monthTime} and COMP_ID = #{compId}

select count(1) counts,${param.housePriceSql} byName, as dim from FUN_SALE WHERE COMP_ID=#{param.compId} AND ${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND SALE_STATUS IN (1,2,4) AND SALE_ROOM is not null AND SALE_REG is not null GROUP BY ${param.housePriceSql},
ORDER BY count(1) desc

select count(1) counts,${param.houseAreaSql} byName, as dim from FUN_SALE WHERE COMP_ID=#{param.compId} AND ${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND SALE_STATUS IN (1,2,4) AND SALE_ROOM is not null AND SALE_REG is not null GROUP BY ${param.houseAreaSql},
ORDER BY count(1) desc

select count(1) counts,SALE_ROOM byName, as dim from FUN_SALE WHERE COMP_ID=#{param.compId} AND ${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND SALE_STATUS IN (1,2,4) AND SALE_ROOM is not null AND SALE_REG is not null GROUP BY SALE_ROOM,
ORDER BY count(1) desc

with t1 as ( select count(1) counts,
user_id dept_id
as rankId from fun_sale WHERE COMP_ID=#{param.compId} AND ${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND SALE_STATUS IN (1,2,4)
and user_id > 0 group by user_id
group by dept_id
),t2 as ( select count(1) counts,
user_id dept_id
as rankId from FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER WHERE COMP_ID=#{param.compId} AND ${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND BUY_CUST_STATUS IN (1,2,4)
and user_id > 0 group by user_id
group by dept_id
) select top 15 t1.counts house,t2.counts cust,t1.rankId,t1.counts + t2.counts as totalCounts from t1 join t2 on t1.rankId=t2.rankId where t1.counts + t2.counts > 0 order by t1.counts + t2.counts desc

select COUNT (1) AS totalCounts, SUM (IIF(SALE_KEY = '1', 1, 0)) AS keyCount, SUM (IIF(SALE_EXPLRTH = 1, 1, 0)) AS explrthCount, SUM (IIF(TRUE_FLAG = '1', 1, 0)) AS trueCount, SUM (IIF(SALE_MAP > '0', 1, 0)) AS photoCount, SUM (IIF(VIDEO_NUM > '0', 1, 0)) AS voidoCount, SUM (IIF(PANORAMA_MAP > '0', 1, 0)) AS panoramaCount from FUN_SALE
AND COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND ${param.serchRange}=#{param.serchRangeId} AND SALE_STATUS IN (1,2,4)
SELECT count(1) house,${caseWhenSql} as price FROM FUN_SALE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND SALE_STATUS IN (1,2,4) GROUP BY ${caseWhenSql} ORDER BY count(1) desc

FROM FUN_RENT_CUSTOMER WHERE RENT_CUST_ID IN
#{item}

ORDER BY
SALE_ID LEASE_ID BUY_CUST_ID RENT_CUST_ID
DESC

choose.when: (CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),iif (CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),A.CREATION_TIME,120) >= '${param.startTime}' AND CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),A.CREATION_TIME,120) <=DATEADD( WEEK,1,DATEADD(DAY, 1 - DATEPART(WEEKDAY, '${param.startTime}' )-1,'${param.startTime}' )),'${param.startTime}' ,DATEADD( WEEKDAY,1 - DATEPART(WEEKDAY, A.CREATION_TIME), A.CREATION_TIME)),120) + '-' + iif (CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),A.CREATION_TIME,120) >= CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),DATEADD( WEEKDAY,1 - DATEPART(WEEKDAY, '${param.endTime}' ),'${param.endTime}' ),120),'${param.endTime}' ,CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),DATEADD(WEEK,1,DATEADD(DAY,1 - DATEPART(WEEKDAY, A.CREATION_TIME)-1,A.CREATION_TIME )),120)))

mapper.select:
SET DATEFIRST 1; SELECT
count(1) num,a.HOUSE_ROOM_1 as room,
count(1) num,b.SOURCE_ID as regId,
count(1) num,b.SOURCE_ID as useage,
count(1) num,CONCAT(b.SOURCE_ID,'_',c.SOURCE_ID) as section,
count(1) num,(${param.priceUnit}) price,
count(1) num,(${param.areaUnit}) area,
as date FROM ${param.tableName} a
LEFT JOIN FUN_CUST_REGSECTIONS b ON b.CASE_ID = A.${param.primaryId} and b.CASE_TYPE=3 and b.SOURCE_TYPE=0
LEFT join FUN_CUST_DEMAND_SPLIT b on b.CASE_ID = A.${param.primaryId} and b.SOURCE_TYPE=2 and b.CASE_TYPE=3
LEFT JOIN FUN_CUST_REGSECTIONS b ON b.CASE_ID = A.${param.primaryId} and b.CASE_TYPE=3 and b.SOURCE_TYPE=0 LEFT JOIN FUN_CUST_REGSECTIONS c ON c.CASE_ID = A.${param.primaryId} and c.CASE_TYPE=3 and c.SOURCE_TYPE=1
LEFT JOIN FUN_CUST_REGSECTIONS reg ON reg.CASE_ID = A.${param.primaryId} and reg.CASE_TYPE=3 and reg.SOURCE_TYPE=0
LEFT JOIN FUN_CUST_REGSECTIONS section ON section.CASE_ID = A.${param.primaryId} and section.CASE_TYPE=3 and section.SOURCE_TYPE=1
WHERE A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND A.${param.serchRange} = #{param.serchRangeId} AND A.CREATION_TIME >= #{param.startTime} AND A.CREATION_TIME <= #{param.endTime}
AND reg.SOURCE_ID in #{item}
AND section.SOURCE_ID in #{item}
GROUP BY ,
CONCAT(b.SOURCE_ID,'_',c.SOURCE_ID) (${param.priceUnit}) (${param.areaUnit}) a.HOUSE_ROOM_1 b.SOURCE_ID b.SOURCE_ID

SALE_ID

update FUN_SALE set
ACTION_TIME = dateadd(dd,${days},ACTION_TIME)
TRACK_TIME = dateadd(dd,${days},TRACK_TIME)
PRIVATE_TIME = dateadd(dd,${days},PRIVATE_TIME)
where SALE_NO = #{caseNo}

update FUN_SALE set USER_ID = NULL, ARCHIVE_ID = NUll, SALE_SOURCE = 5 , SALE_LEVEL = 1 , UPDATE_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , SYNC_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , ACTION_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , TRACK_TIME = #{paramMap.now} , TRACK_TIME2 = #{paramMap.now} , SENDTOTENCENT = 0 , PLATE_TYPE = 3 , ORANGE_FLAG = 0 , SALE_COOPERATE = 0 , CITY_SHARE_FLAG = 0, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{paramMap.organizationId}, USER_LEVEL = #{paramMap.userLevel}, TISSUE_LINE = #{paramMap.tissueLineHouse} where USER_ID = #{paramMap.userId}
update FUN_SALE set HAS_RECORDED = 0, SALE_ENTRUST_PRICE = NULL, HAS_ENTRUST = 0 where SALE_ID = #{saleId}
update FUN_SALE set HAS_RECORDED = #{record}, HAS_ENTRUST = #{hasEntrust}, SALE_ENTRUST_PRICE = #{saleEntrustPrice} where SALE_ID = #{saleId}
mapper.select:
select SALE_ID as caseId, 1 as caseType, (BUILD_NAME + '/' + SALE_NO) as funNum, (cast(ISNULL(SALE_ROOM,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(SALE_HALL,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(KITCHEN,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(SALE_WEI,0) as varchar(10)) + '') as houseType, SALE_AREA as area, SALE_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, '' as position, CREATION_TIME as inputTime, SALE_TOTAL_PRICE*#{offereeRate}*#{cityRate} as money, null as priceUnit, null as area, CREATION_TIME as funCreationTime from FUN_SALE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} and USER_ID = #{userId} and SALE_STATUS NOT IN (5,6,7)
and 1=0
UNION ALL select LEASE_ID as caseId, 2 as caseType, (BUILD_NAME + '/' + LEASE_NO) as funNum, (cast(ISNULL(LEASE_ROOM,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(LEASE_HALL,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(KITCHEN,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(LEASE_WEI,0) as varchar(10)) + '') as houseType, LEASE_AREA as area, LEASE_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, '' as position, CREATION_TIME as inputTime, LEASE_TOTAL_PRICE*#{offereeRate}/100 as money, ISNULL(PRICE_UNIT,1) as priceUnit, ISNULL(LEASE_AREA,0) as area, CREATION_TIME as funCreationTime from FUN_LEASE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} and USER_ID = #{userId} and LEASE_STATUS NOT IN (5,6,7)
and 1=0
UNION ALL select SALE_ID as caseId, 1 as caseType, (BUILD_NAME + '/' + SALE_NO) as funNum, (cast(ISNULL(SALE_ROOM,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(SALE_HALL,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(KITCHEN,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(SALE_WEI,0) as varchar(10)) + '') as houseType, SALE_AREA as area, SALE_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, '' as position, EXPLRTH_DATETIME as inputTime, SALE_TOTAL_PRICE*#{funCheckRate}*#{cityRate} as money, null as priceUnit, null as area, CREATION_TIME as funCreationTime from FUN_SALE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} and FUNKAN_USER_ID = #{userId} and SALE_STATUS NOT IN (5,6,7)
and 1=0
UNION ALL select LEASE_ID as caseId, 2 as caseType, (BUILD_NAME + '/' + LEASE_NO) as funNum, (cast(ISNULL(LEASE_ROOM,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(LEASE_HALL,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(KITCHEN,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(LEASE_WEI,0) as varchar(10)) + '') as houseType, LEASE_AREA as area, LEASE_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, '' as position, EXPLRTH_DATETIME as inputTime, LEASE_TOTAL_PRICE*#{funCheckRate}/100 as money, ISNULL(PRICE_UNIT,1) as priceUnit, ISNULL(LEASE_AREA,0) as area, CREATION_TIME as funCreationTime from FUN_LEASE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} and FUNKAN_USER_ID = #{userId} and LEASE_STATUS NOT IN (5,6,7)
and 1=0
UNION ALL select A.SALE_ID as caseId, 1 as caseType, (A.BUILD_NAME + '/' + A.SALE_NO) as funNum, (cast(ISNULL(A.SALE_ROOM,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.SALE_HALL,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.KITCHEN,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.SALE_WEI,0) as varchar(10)) + '') as houseType, A.SALE_AREA as area, A.SALE_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, '' as position, B.CREATOR_TIME as inputTime, A.SALE_TOTAL_PRICE*#{submitKeyRate}*#{cityRate} as money, null as priceUnit, null as area, CREATION_TIME as funCreationTime from FUN_SALE as A left join FUN_KEY as B on A.SALE_ID = B.CASE_ID and B.CASE_TYPE = 1 WHERE A.COMP_ID = #{compId} and B.USER_ID = #{userId} and A.SALE_STATUS NOT IN (5,6,7) AND B.KEY_STATUS <> 3
and 1=0
UNION ALL select A.LEASE_ID as caseId, 2 as caseType, (A.BUILD_NAME + '/' + A.LEASE_NO) as funNum, (cast(ISNULL(A.LEASE_ROOM,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.LEASE_HALL,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.KITCHEN,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.LEASE_WEI,0) as varchar(10)) + '') as houseType, A.LEASE_AREA as area, A.LEASE_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, '' as position, B.CREATOR_TIME as inputTime, A.LEASE_TOTAL_PRICE*#{submitKeyRate}/100 as money, ISNULL(A.PRICE_UNIT,1) as priceUnit, ISNULL(A.LEASE_AREA,0) as area, CREATION_TIME as funCreationTime from FUN_LEASE as A left join FUN_KEY as B on A.LEASE_ID = B.CASE_ID and B.CASE_TYPE = 2 WHERE A.COMP_ID = #{compId} and B.USER_ID = #{userId} and A.LEASE_STATUS NOT IN (5,6,7) AND B.KEY_STATUS <> 3
and 1=0
UNION ALL select A.SALE_ID as caseId, 1 as caseType, (A.BUILD_NAME + '/' + A.SALE_NO) as funNum, (cast(ISNULL(A.SALE_ROOM,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.SALE_HALL,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.KITCHEN,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.SALE_WEI,0) as varchar(10)) + '') as houseType, A.SALE_AREA as area, A.SALE_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, '' as position, B.RECORD_TIME as inputTime, A.SALE_TOTAL_PRICE*#{recordRate}*#{cityRate} as money, null as priceUnit, null as area, CREATION_TIME as funCreationTime from FUN_SALE as A left join FUN_ENTRUST as B on A.SALE_ID = B.CASE_ID and B.CASE_TYPE = 1 WHERE A.COMP_ID = #{compId} and B.RECORD_USER = #{userId} and A.SALE_STATUS NOT IN (5,6,7)
and 1=0
UNION ALL select A.LEASE_ID as caseId, 2 as caseType, (A.BUILD_NAME + '/' + A.LEASE_NO) as funNum, (cast(ISNULL(A.LEASE_ROOM,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.LEASE_HALL,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.KITCHEN,0) as varchar(10)) + '' + cast(ISNULL(A.LEASE_WEI,0) as varchar(10)) + '') as houseType, A.LEASE_AREA as area, A.LEASE_TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, '' as position, B.RECORD_TIME as inputTime, A.LEASE_TOTAL_PRICE*#{recordRate}/100 as money, ISNULL(A.PRICE_UNIT,1) as priceUnit, ISNULL(A.LEASE_AREA,0) as area, CREATION_TIME as funCreationTime from FUN_LEASE as A left join FUN_ENTRUST as B on A.LEASE_ID = B.CASE_ID and B.CASE_TYPE = 2 WHERE A.COMP_ID = #{compId} and B.RECORD_USER = #{userId} and A.LEASE_STATUS NOT IN (5,6,7)
and 1=0
